title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - E-jets 175 - using the autopilot
description:
In this video we will have a look how to use the current implementation of the autopilot in the E-jets 175/Embraer 175 which has been released as early preview aircraft early January. We will first go through the different buttons which allow you to configure and activate the autopilot and after that will have a look how to functionalities are working during a flight.
